attributes.action: Working parents to get two year funding.
attributes.additional_details: So many parents are trying to work to provide for their family but over half of their wage goes on childcare. We have to work more hours to cover our bills. People that are working are helping the economy and we should get help back.
attributes.background: Working parents to get two year funding.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the finances of working parents, but we're not sure exactly what funding you'd like the Government to provide.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Provide free childcare to working parents for children over 9 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580622

Fund free childcare for all pre-school pupils: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332146

If you want the Government to do something different to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
